verses.name: Acts 7:31
verses.text: When Moses saw it, he wondered at the sight: and as he drew near to behold it, the voice of the Lord came unto him,

verses.name: Acts 7:32
verses.text: Saying, I am the God of thy fathers, the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. Then Moses trembled, and durst not behold.

verses.name: Acts 7:33
verses.text: Then said the Lord to him, Put off thy shoes from thy feet: for the place where thou standest is holy ground.
